metadata.title: CVE-2024-1547 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Through a series of API calls and redirects, an attacker-controlled alertdialog could have been displayed on another website (with the victimwebsite's URL shown). This vulnerability affects Firefox < 123, Firefox ESR< 115.8, and Thunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
